title: mab
description: We will focus on how to solve the multi-armed bandit problem using four strategies, including epsilon-greedy, softmax exploration, upper confidence bound, and Thompson sampling. We will see how they deal with the exploration-exploitation dilemma in their own unique ways. We will also work on a billion-dollar problem, online advertising, and demonstrate how to solve it using a multi-armed bandit algorithm. Finally, we will solve the contextual advertising problem using contextual bandits to make more informed decisions in ad optimization.
